{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Croquet {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Croquet Croquet (French: croquet ; (UK) or (US)) is a sport that involves hitting wooden or plastic balls with a mallet through hoops (often called "wickets" in the United States) embedded in a grass playing court. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croquet)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
